nodes.text: Allya was, according to a commonly told story, a female Jedi whom the Jedi Council sent into exile on Dathomir, in 600 BBY. There, she allegedly trained other women in the ways of the Force, ultimately giving birth to the Dathomirians. However, the Jedi Council had no such records, and the Dathomirians had other, contradicting stories about their origins. Allya wrote the Book of Law, a book which portrayed the Jedi Order in a bad light, causing the Nightsisters to have little respect for the order.

Allya was first mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 magazine, Star Wars: Build the Millennium Falcon 59. She initially appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity in The Courtship of Princess Leia, a 1994 novel written by Dave Wolverton and published by Bantam Spectra.
